docs.snippet: Less than two months before he was killed, Walter Lamer Scott turned 50 and wanted everyone around him to join in the celebration....
docs.lead_paragraph: Less than two months before he was killed, Walter Lamer Scott turned 50 and wanted everyone around him to join in the celebration.

headline.main: Man Shot by Police Had Much to Celebrate in Recent Months
headline.print_headline: Man Shot by Police Had Much to Celebrate in Recent Months
